Html:
For those interested, I've put together a personal "contrib" project which adds coroutines to MVVM Light, inspired by the way they work in Caliburn.

The project is here: http://bitbucket.org/mabster/madprops.mvvmlight/

You can see a few posts about it on my blog at http://matthamilton.net.

Hope someone gets some use out of it! It has certainly been fun to put together.

Cheers,
Matt
